wikitext.*:
<noinclude>{{month|June}}
Events that occurred on 1 June.
==On Earth==
</noinclude>
* '''[[1840]]''' - [[George Tolkien]] dies.
* '''[[1914]]''' - [[George Sayer]], friend of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], is born.
* '''[[1917]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] is considered fit for general service again.
* '''[[1917]]''' - [[Edith Tolkien]] writes her final letter to her husband at Thirtle Bridge army camp, near Withernsea from her lodgings in Hornsea.
* '''[[1946]]''' -  Actor [[Brian Cox]] is born.
* '''[[1961]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Jan Broberg|a letter to Jan Broberg]].
* '''[[1966]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Royston F. Porthouse|a letter to Royston F. Porthouse]].
* '''[[1984]]''' - ''[[Moria: The Dwarven City]]'' is published.
* '''[[2005]]''' - ''[[Tolkien and the Great War]]'' is released in paperback in the US.
* '''[[2006]]''' - ''[[Tolkien Studies: Volume 3]]'' is published.
* '''[[2017]] - ''[[Beren and Lúthien]]'' is published in the UK and Europe.'''
* '''[[2018]] - ''[[Tolkien: Maker of Middle-earth]]''''' and ''[[Tolkien: Treasures]]'' are published, accompanying the exhibition "Tolkien: Maker of Middle-earth" by [[Bodleian Library]].
* '''[[2025]]''' - [[Shaun Gunner]] is appointed Chief Executive Officer of [[The Tolkien Society]], having previously served over 12 years as Chair.<ref name="CEO">{{webcite|author=Daniel Helen|articleurl=https://www.tolkiensociety.org/2025/06/tolkien-society-appoints-new-chief-executive/|articlename=Tolkien Society appoints new Chief Executive|date=2 June 2025|website=TS|accessed=2 June 2025}}</ref>

==In Arda==
:''There are no known events on this day.''<noinclude>
